mapper.select: select id,username,password,DATE_FORMAT(register_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') register_time from user order by ${orderField} ${orderType}
select username,password from user where username = #{username} and password = #{password} limit 1;
select (case when count(username)>0 then 1 else 0 end) as result from user where username = #{username};

select id,username,password,DATE_FORMAT(register_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') register_time from user where username like '%${username}%' AND register_time between #{startime} and #{endtime} order by ${orderField} ${orderType}
select id from user where username like '%${username}%' AND register_time between #{startime} and #{endtime}
